attributes.content: Ooh, looks like it's about time. Gotta get to work now.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Lemme see the schedule for today.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Let's get around to Maggy's 'Improvement proposals for Drone Dragonfly operation' and polish off my submissions for today. Get around to the rest later. Then I just gotta wait for her.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Doing maintenance on Saria's armor? Main thing should be giving it a new coat of paint... crap, did I not order paint?!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Arghh—we're good, we're good. Didn't use it up last time.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Main focus for today'll be that.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: If I get the time, I'll send some orders for a couple new parts. Then I can give all my frontline Meeboos some real maintenance.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Not too happy about Saria's suit here...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Wonder why it can't charge up properly.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Weird. C'mon, where's the problem, officer?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Mayer! I know you're in there!
Prime suspect found. We're on Easy Street now.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Just need to restore a failed node, and the whole suit should be back up and working again.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Uh-huh. Optimize charge circuits first. Paint over next. You'll be back to regular service in no time.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: D'you want some extra features while I'm at it? Hmm.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ugh. I don't know if Kal'tsit's gonna chew me out for abusing privileges...
Who cares. Your fault for acting deaf, Mayer.
Check over your nodes one more time. Gonna be a pain once the paint gets all in you.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Working with earphones in? Aren't you worried someone's gonna spook you?
Let go of me, damnit, let go of me!!
You really blew it, Mayer. I had something good for you, and you wouldn't even open the door for me. Plus, you bit me...
Sorry, Closure. But, like, you know I bite when someone interrupts my work.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Fine, I'll let you bite me too, then. Fair's fair?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You're applying anti-Originium paint to a suit right now, I see?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Pass, then. I bite you here and one moment later I'll be in Medical. Not worth it.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Eh, I guess you're not wrong.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I specifically remember setting it up to automatically open and close. Pretty sure I also set it a moment ago to 'do not disturb.'
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Did you just hack my door?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: No way~~ It was like that when I walked in.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Can you gimme a moment? I'll check the tapes.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I got a lotta sensitive Rhine material in here, y'know? It'd be bad news for all of us if I lost something.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Nah, you should get back to work for now...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: R—Remember your health and safety regs. This paint's, uh, pretty dangerous, yeah? Things could go wrong with you trying to multitask!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's fine, I've got mechanical arms on it.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hmm, which program was it again?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Er, Mayer, don't you think this paint's gonna go volatile soon?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That paint? It's fine, sheesh. It's inert.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You could dump it in boiling water and ionize it for three hours, freeze it, and it'd still be good to go the moment it thaws.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Make some smart robots with me?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ugh. I don't know if Kal'tsit's gonna chew me out for abusing privileges...
attributes.name: Monitor Feed

attributes.content: Who cares. Your fault for acting deaf, Mayer.
attributes.name: Monitor Feed

attributes.content: AaaaghhI'msorryit'smyfault don't sic the Meeboos on me ow ow ow ow waaaghhhhh!!!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yeah, go on. What was it you wanted me for?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I wanted you to help me with an explosive-type thingy...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Underlying machine's a Raythean Challenger Hellcat high-performance operation platform...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Topside already has a custom-ordered full-thermal Arts impact generator...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But it's not working a hundred percent perfect, so I need your help...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just take a sniff of this first.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: We're not gonna get any business done with you bawling your eyes out.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Still dunno why you love sniffing the refined lubricant I have in here...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Guess Warfarin wasn't wrong. There's no blood in your veins, just machine oil.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Enough of that. Let's get real.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You need me to refit the Raythean Challenger. Raise its attack power. Right?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Also, self-defense, damage resist, and evac plans. After all, we're gonna put a smart little guy in there. Can't have it breaking after one use.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Then you came to the right person.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Remember how there was a little hoard in the hangar? As long as you—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Even if as a rush job, your commission still lands bottom-right of the very last note.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Any way I can jump the queue?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So in other words, two months.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Work fast, it'll be fifty days.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Do you really work that fast?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Decently. Sometimes inspiration hits and the work's done.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Er... I'll leave you to it, then...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You format the door for me first. I need to do its settings over.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Also, strip your sys-op authority off it.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Right now. Straight away. Giddy up.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Did you change the password? Is that why the door's not opening?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And that should be about done.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Huh? Someone at the door again?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Maggy! The door's broken! Push the button on the side and come in!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I'm still busy with something for Saria here. Can't lay out the carpet for you.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: So, you need something from me?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Drone plans. Wondering how they're doing?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Listed out some technical essentials, improvement proposals and required materials. Everything's in that file on the table there. You look through, and if it's all good, we can set up a new time to help you make some fitting parts.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: If you've got issues with it, we'll have a meeting about it.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Which file on which table is it?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Your mechanical arms are pointing at at least four different tables. How should I know which one?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ahhh don't pull me! I'm still painting here!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You can leave paint and keep painting later. Help me find the files first, okay?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: These are your expensed items for last month.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. I meant this one.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ain't no thang. Just what I oughta do.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Then I'll be heading out now. Bye-bye.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I almost forgot the most important part!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Can I ask you what the time is right now?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Huh? You mean me? I eat an energy bar and I'm fine.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I bought it at the cafeteria. They had the freshwater stuff you love today.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I wanted you to come eat with me, but then I lost track of time myself...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So after I finished eating, I got a portion bagged up to bring over.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: How much longer will you be working?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Well, that's no good. Let me help you out there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's fine, I can do it.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Either you let me help you, or I feed you your meal. Pick one.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Alright fine I get it! Give me a hand.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: *Sigh*... It's only times like these I miss all of Rhine's self-cleaning facilities.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: So why don't you go back?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If I went back, they'd set me up with a mountain of annoying work, and I'd have no time to improve my Meeboos.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: And, like, I had to deal with interpersonal stuff there too.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Like you don't have to here?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You're always out on fieldwork. You don't know all the politics and warring between sections.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Over there, right? You'd make a new friend one day, turn around, and bam, someone tells you 'they're from the blah-blah section, best you stay away from them.'
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: And what's worse is even if you're in the same section, sometimes your bosses are competing and you're all trying to drag each other down.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's stuff I'm, like, just not good at dealing with.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: So I ended up scarpering here.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Sorry, I shouldn't have asked you about...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Then I should be on my way.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Meeboos, can I ask you to keep an eye on her? Otherwise she'll go straight back to work the moment I'm gone.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: My Meeboos don't have voice modules. They won't answer you.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I still have to nag you.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Okay then. This time I'm really off. Bye-bye.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hmm, maybe I should put those part orders through before I eat—
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Whuah! What the hell are you doing, Meeboos?!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: It's just a little bit of work. I'm not gonna forget to eat.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Fine, I get it, I'm eating, I'm eating now!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Mmm, order parts first or fix some Meeboos first?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Meeboos win out, yeah. Meeboos are more important.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Touch up paint, inspect wiring, update data, replenish energy.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's what Meeboo maintenance is made of...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Still four more on mission duty, and my five reserve ones need servicing too.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Looks like I can get 'em done today.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Mayer! Open up!! Work needs you!
What's got you all smiles and rainbows?
You come here. I'll tell you.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Stick your hand out. It's got something good for you.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Huh, don't hear that every day. Wonder what it is?
Everything I planned this morning is all done!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ahh—that doesn't count. I made the executive decision just now to move ordering parts to tomorrow.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Lemme see what I gotta do tomorrow.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Go to the Procurement Department and order parts.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Need to install test equipment for Medical.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Oh, gotta debug my workbench again.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Eat a bowl of instant noodles and then sleep.
attributes.name: Mayer
